{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Extreme Networks |model=AP3825 |revision=e (WS-AP3825e) |series=AC1750 |asin=B00N5599PO;UK; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/27/2014 |fcc_id=QXO-AP3825E, QXO-AP3715E, QXO-AP3715I, U2M-PCE3300AN, U2M-PCE4551AH |ic_id=4141B-AP3825E, 4138A-AP3715I |pcb_id=7016A0683018 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P1020E |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F512-M29EWH |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V73CAG01168RBJ-I9H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, console port |wi1_module=Senao PCE3300AN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9590;AR9590-AR1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Senao PCE4551AH <!-- (-ETS) --> |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9890;QCA9890-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags=enterprise class |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D8:84:66 |oui_eth=D8:84:66 }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Dual Band Indoor Wireless Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.extremenetworks.com/product/ap3825/}}
*Dual Radio 802.11ac 3x3:3 MIMO (ext. antennas)
{{See also|Extreme Networks|Enterasys|Aerohive}}
*If FCC ID ''{{FCC.io|QXO-AP3825E}}'' is related this device, it is likely using :[[QCA]] QCA9890 (QCA9890-BR4A) for its 802.11ac radio. <!-- :The SoC used may be [[QCA]] QCA9558/QCA9550 --> :The module shown in this filing is from ''[[Senao]]'': :• [[Senao PCE3300AN]] (AH) • [[Senao PCE4551AH]] (-ETS)
===Models=== *[[Extreme Networks AP3825i]] (WS-AP3825i) - integral antennas <!-- B00JUY4UYE;UK; --> *[[Extreme Networks AP3825e]] (WS-AP3825e) - external antennas <!-- B00N5599PO;UK; --> :FCC ID: QXO-AP3825E (2014-03-27) • ''[[Extreme Networks]]''
===Links=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-ws-ap3825i/101168 ''Adding OpenWrt support for WS-AP3825i'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
===See also=== :;[[Extreme Networks]] • [https://www.extremenetworks.com/products/extremewireless/?group=214 Wi-Fi 6 AP] *[[Extreme Networks AP5050D]] - Wi-Fi 6E Cloud-managed Access Point :4x4:4 radio, OFDMA, outdoor, w/ int. 30/70deg directional antennas *[[Extreme Networks AP5050U]] - Wi-Fi 6E Cloud-managed Access Point :4x4:4 radio, OFDMA, outdoor, IP67-rated, w/ omni-directional antennas *[[Extreme Networks AP5010]] - Wi-Fi 6E Tri-Radio 4x4:4 Indoor Access Point :4x4:4 radio,indoor, with support for multiple operating systems *[[Extreme Networks AP4000]] - Wi-Fi 6E Tri-Radio 2x2:2 Indoor Access Point :2x2:2 radio, indoor, 2.4/5/6GHz, 3.9Gbps, dual-band threat sensor *[[Extreme Networks AP302W]] - Wi-Fi 6 Dual-Radio 2x2:2 Access Point :2x2:2 radio, indoor wallplate, wall and desk mount, enterprise-grade *[[Extreme Networks AP360i]] (e) - Wi-Fi 6 Dual-Radio Outdoor Access Point :2x2:2 radio, outdoor, dual 2x2 software programable radio
*[[Aerohive AP370]] • [[Aerohive AP390]] • [[Aerohive AP630]] *[[Aerohive AP650]] • [[Aerohive AP650X]] • [[Aerohive]]
*[[Enterasys WS-AP3660]] • [[Enterasys WS-AP3705i]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3715i]] • [[Enterasys WS-AP3715e]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3715i Wireless Module]] (802.11abgn) :FCC ID: QXO-AP3715I (2013-05-24) • ''[[Enterasys]] Networks'' :QXO-AP3715E (2013-05-24), QXO-AP3715E1 (2014-02-04)
